release.description: New features, updates and bug fixes.
release.action: "FP64": Make equals consistent with hashCode.
"Sum": Avoid a NaN result when combining Sum instances with infinite sums of the same sign.
"Precision": Document inaccurate decimal value representation when converting to and from a double in the round method.
"Sum": Add subtract(Sum) method.
"Stirling": Compute Stirling numbers of the first kind.
Add "Stirling" class to compute Stirling numbers of the second kind.

release.description: New features, updates and bug fixes. Adds a commons-numbers-bom module.
release.action: Add a user guide.
Add a Bill of Materials (BOM) to aid in dependency management when referencing multiple Apache Commons Numbers artifacts. The BOM should be used to ensure all imported artifacts are compatible.
"Precision": Allow Precision.compareTo using a maxUlps to be used for sorting. This corrects handling of NaN comparisons.
"Precision": Reduce number of operations in Precision.equals using a maxUlps.

Updated support for the beta functions. "RegularizedBeta": Added the complement and derivative of the regularized beta function. Added "IncompleteBeta" and "Beta" classes. Functionality is ported from the Boost C++ library.

Improve the binomial coefficient classes. Avoid recursive method calls. Avoid overflow for BinomialCoefficientDouble for large results close to infinity. Use precomputed factorials and the LogBeta function for efficiency.
"LogBeta": Avoid overflow for tiny arguments.
"GammaRatio": Compute the ratio of two gamma functions.
"BrentSolver": Avoid overflow creating the initial value between the lower and upper.
"Erfcx": Compute a scaled complementary error function: erfcx(z) = erfc(z) * exp(z*z).

"Factorial/FactorialDouble": Tabulate all factorials with exact 64-bit double representations of n! up to n=170. This change deprecates the FactorialDouble class and removes obsolete caching functionality.
"ContinuedFraction": Update to use a shared implementation with GeneralizedContinuedFraction.
"Gamma/LogGamma/RegularizedGamma": Update the gamma function implementations to increase accuracy and support for extreme values. Functionality is ported from the Boost C++ library.

"GeneralizedContinuedFraction": A continued fraction class to compute using a generator. Allows evaluation of continued fractions from a regular series where coefficients can be computed iteratively from the previous coefficients.
"ContinuedFraction": Set a minimum bound on the relative error epsilon. Prevents an infinite loop when the epsilon is zero.
"FactorialDouble": Prevent caching values that are infinite. The cache will support factorials up to 170.

"Erf/Erfc": Use a rational function approximation accurate to 53-bits of precision. This replaces the use of the regularized gamma functions P and Q and increases accuracy at extreme limits of the function. Execution speed is improved. Functionality is ported from the Boost C++ library.
"InverseErfc": Support full range of [0, 2]. This lowers the supported minimum value from 2^-53 to double min value. Execution speed is improved. Functionality is ported from the Boost C++ library.
"RegularizedBeta": Detect edge cases for arguments that can be evaluated by exploiting properties of the regularized beta function.
"BrentSolver": Identify brackets with small objective values.
Fix wrong javadoc.

release.description: This is the first official release of Apache Commons Numbers (requires Java 8).
release.action: Combined "LinearCombination" and "Summation" into single "Sum" class.
Added SortInPlace utility, original from Commons Math.

Moved "Norms", "LinearCombination", and "Summation" from commons-numbers-arrays module to commons-numbers-core module. Moved "CosAngle" from commons-numbers-arrays module to commons-numbers-angle module.
Replaced "SafeNorm" with "Norms". Added "Summation" class for extended precision summation.
"Angle" replaces "PlaneAngle" and "PlaneAngleRadians".
Use iterative implementation of "trigamma" function. Thanks to Dmitriy Golovashkin for reporting.
Replace angle normalize method with normalizer method that returns operator instance.
Adding Reduce operation originally from Commons Math to commons-numbers-angle module.

"LinearCombination": Update to use the dot2s algorithm. Avoids construction of an intermediate array for array dot products. Update the hi-lo splitting algorithm to use Dekker's split to ensure the product round-off is computed to exact precision.
Precision compareTo method now handles NaN properly to ensure consistent sorting.
"Fraction": Port tests from commons-lang Fraction to demonstrate functional compatibility between the lang and numbers implementation of Fraction.
"ArithmeticUtils": Refine pow(int, int) and pow(long, int) for edge cases.
"Fraction/BigFraction": Fixed pow(int) to handle Integer.MIN_VALUE and throw ArithmeticException for negative exponents to a fraction of zero.
Fixed Fraction/BigFraction from(double, int) to support Integer.MIN_VALUE as max denominator.
